context: Lyft maintained ~28% US ride-hailing share but faced questions about long-term viability against Uber's scale and autonomous vehicle transition. New CEO David Risher focused on cost cuts and rider experience.

competitors.name: Uber
competitors.notes: Dominant competitor with ~72% US ride-hailing share and delivery business

competitors.name: Waymo
competitors.notes: Expanding autonomous ride-hailing in San Francisco and Phoenix

competitors.name: Cruise
competitors.notes: GM autonomous vehicles, though operations paused after incidents

competitors.name: Via
competitors.notes: Transit technology and shared ride platform

competitors.name: Traditional Taxis
competitors.notes: Modernized taxi services with app booking

competitors.name: Micromobility
competitors.notes: E-bikes and scooters for short trips
